chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Type
X: Type
c: (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y
lc: X -> nat
Hc: forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x
i: nat
ll: list X
j: nat

Goal:
map fst (link i ll j) = list_an i (length ll)

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
link = fix link (i : nat) (ll : list X) (j : nat) {struct ll} : list (nat * nat) := match ll with | nil => nil | x :: ll0 => (i, j) :: link (S i) ll0 (lc x + j) end : nat -> list X -> nat -> list (nat * nat) Arguments link _%nat_scope _%list_scope _%nat_scope
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
list_an = fix list_an (a n : nat) {struct n} : list nat := match n with | 0 => nil | S n0 => a :: list_an (S a) n0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments list_an (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, In a ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- list ?A]
Tauto.FF : Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]
Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]

snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]

nil : list ?A where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]

ZMicromega.normalise : RingMicromega.Formula BinNums.Z -> ?T -> Tauto.cnf (RingMicromega.NFormula BinNums.Z) ?T where ?T : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat ll : list X j : nat |- Type]

Forall_forall_map : forall (X : Type) (f : nat -> X) (n : nat) (l : list X) (P : X -> Prop), l = map f (list_an 0 n) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> P (f i)) < -> Forall P l
